description:
Replace the empty knowledge base list with an interactive walkthrough showing drag-and-drop upload zones, supported file formats (PDF, DOCX, etc.), and a 'Try Sample KB' button that loads a pre-configured demo knowledge base. Include visual examples of how uploaded documents become searchable context for agents.

**Rationale:** New users face a cold-start problem with no knowledge bases - they don't understand what to upload or how KBs power the RAG system. An interactive empty state with sample data reduces time-to-value and demonstrates the platform's core capability immediately.
title: Interactive Empty State for Knowledge Bases
